effect.diamond-pearl: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.
effect.platinum: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
